title.title: Now showing!
title.desc: Available on Apple Soundcast and Spotify
title.about: Maajabu Gospel is a well-known music production label, associated with four talented and popular ambassadors: Mike Kalambay, Sandra Mbuyi, Deborah Lukalu, and Rosny Kayiba. These artists, who are among the top gospel singers in the DRC, have contributed to the label's popularity, especially through events like Maajabu Talent, where they play the role of coaches and judges.
title.abouter: Through competitions like Maajabu Talent and Maajabu Rafiki, they have demonstrated their dedication to nurturing the next generation of gospel artists, providing them with a platform to shine and sharing their accumulated wisdom over the years.
